title: Razer Blade 15 (2022) vs Alienware x15 R2: Which gaming laptop to buy?
content:
The launch of Intel’s new 12th gen Alder Lake mobile processors was followed by the arrival of a new range of gaming notebooks on the market. Both Razer and Dell were one of the first manufacturers to launch new gaming laptops powered by the new Intel chips. In this article, we’re going to take a

The post Razer Blade 15 (2022) vs Alienware x15 R2: Which gaming laptop to buy? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this article, we're going to take a look at the Razer Blade 15 vs alienware x15 comparison to find out which one's better.
